name: Readiness endpoint /readyz
description: Tests the /readyz endpoint for server readiness status

steps.name: returns 200 OK when server is ready
REQUIRE: Request should complete without error
REQUIRE: Response should not be nil

parameters.name: Actual
parameters.value: *integration_tests.APIResponse(&integration_tests.APIResponse{StatusCode:200, Body:[]uint8{}, Headers:http.Header{"Alt-Svc":[]string{"h3=\":443\"; ma=86400"}, "Cf-Cache-Status":[]string{"DYNAMIC"}, "Cf-Ray":[]string{"9bb9c9c4fb0df2fd-IAD"}, "Content-Length":[]string{"0"}, "Date":[]string{"Sat, 10 Jan 2026 05:31:26 GMT"}, "Nel":[]string{"{\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"success_fraction\":0.0,\"max_age\":604800}"}, "Report-To":[]string{"{\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800,\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https://a.nel.cloudflare.com/report/v4?s=1Ivend0FTvJG0UEqH7xKYDfBnQnWGJdOspZl5pH5yqGcorNwjY6vAnTA7a%2F3Ctm2MCL6vrWFtoG%2FT0Ks8jBlWWWx6i7pjmHI88r6L1Oo9QLo8w%2BLexgL\"}]}"}, "Server":[]string{"cloudflare"}, "Strict-Transport-Security":[]string{"max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains"}, "Vary":[]string{"Origin"}, "X-Content-Type-Options":[]string{"nosniff"}, "X-Frame-Options":[]string{"SAMEORIGIN"}, "X-Request-Id":[]string{"551248c1136d24b99ebb00308bc2dae2"}, "X-Xss-Protection":[]string{"1; mode=block"}}})
